scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy mmarinovic/endemic-rinkeby --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:aurora: npm run prepare:aurora && graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-aurora --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:aurora_testnet: npm run prepare:aurora_testnet && graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-aurora-t3stnet --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
